mapper.select: SELECT id, classifyId, status, importance, created, updated, remark, finishTime, finishStatus, creator, startTime, endTime, title FROM task WHERE creator = #{userId} ORDER BY status ASC, created DESC;
SELECT id, classifyId, status, importance, created, updated, remark, finishTime, finishStatus, creator, startTime, endTime, title FROM task WHERE creator = #{userId} AND id = #{taskId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task SET classifyId = #{classifyId}, status = #{status}, importance = #{importance}, created = #{created}, updated = #{updated}, remark = #{remark}, creator = #{creator}, startTime = #{from}, endTime = #{to}, title = #{title}
